thread.title: Transcript: WSJ Interview With Dallas Fed’s Robert Kaplan

author: wsjcom
title: Transcript: WSJ Interview With Dallas Fed’s Robert Kaplan

organizations.name: robert kaplan federal reserve bank of dallas

text:
Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas President Robert Kaplan spoke with Wall Street Journal reporter Nick Timiraos on Tuesday, Jan. 16, 2018, in Dallas. He discussed his outlook on employment, inflation and the prospect of interest-rate increases this year, as well as his concerns about the direction of U.S. trade and immigration policy. Here is a partial transcript of the interview, lightly edited for clarity and length.
WSJ: Where do you see the economy right now?
...
